	\subsection{Nomenclature for Model Equations} % MUST
	
	%variables for model equations
	\begin{tabular}{ll}
		$x$ & state vector \\
		$u$ & control input vector \\
		$w$ & noise vector \\
		$z$ & regulated output vector \\
		$y$ & measurement vector \\

	%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% MDOEL EQUATIONS %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
	
	\section{Model Equations} % MUST
	
	State Vector and Input Vector:
	\begin{align*}
		x &\in\mathbb{R}^4
		u &\in\mathbb{R}^2
		w &\in\mathbb{R}^4
		z &\in\mathbb{R}^4
		y &\in\mathbb{R}^2
	\end{align*}
	
	\noindent System Equations:			
	\begin{subequations}
	\begin{align}
		\dot{x}(t) &= Ax(t) + B_1w(t) + Bu(t) \\
		z(t) &= C_1x(t) + D_{11}w(t) + D{12}u(t) \\
		y(t) &= Cx(t) + D{21}w(t)
	\end{align}
	\end{subequations}

	%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% PARAMETERS | OUTPUTS %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
	\noindent
	
	\\
	Outputs: $z$ % MAY

	\section{Derivation and Explanation} % SHOULD

	The original description was:\\
	REA2 Obtained from REA1 by leaving out the last row of the matrix C ehemals CHR1
	\textit{Not available}
